text: 6.38 Snd 19.17, Mat 7.2, Mak 4.24, Jem 2.13 Tap nɨbi okok mapen kab ma gɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop monmon ñenɨgabɨm, God nɨbop pen abe ñɨnɨgab agak. Ne wad nɨbop yɨgek yɨgek keb ak gek, dek pi okok amek jɨtep ak yɨgɨnɨgab agak. Tap kuŋay yɨbɨl nɨbop ñɨnɨmuŋ agak. Tap nɨbi bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop ñɨnɨgabɨm tek, God nɨbop abe ñɨnɨgab agak.
